xmppList.content:
If the company is planning to stay in the same location, with same business units and conditions. We can assume that for a term of 10 years there will be two scenarios. 
Scenario A: Without the alarm, the cost will be $125,000 
Scenario B: With the fire alarm, the cost will be $155,000

Therefore it is not worth it
